quote_last: lay in bed, staring at ceiling
title: A Fraction of the Whole
author: Steve Toltz

quote_last: by the clock when Mrs. Flett stepped aboard the Imperial Limited at the Tyndall station, certain that her life was ruined, but managing, through an effort of will, to hold herself erect and to affect an air of preoccupation and liveliness.
title: The Stone Diaries
author: Carol Shields
